title: Eisalaamey Eisalaam Lyrics Aadhi Bhagavan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Eisalaamey eisalaam
Singers: Manasi Scott & Rahul Nambiar (Harmony)
Movie: Aadhi Bhagavan
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics : Snehan

Eisalaamey eisalaam
aanum pennum eisalaam
mooga theeyil vegalaam
vaa.. vaa.. vaa…..

Ilamai ennum thee pori
yeriyum podhe poo pari
enthan dhegam strawberry
vaa.. vaa.. vaa….

Aasai ennum thaai mozhi
pesi paarka or vazhi
asaiva aatril nee kuli
inbathil thenaaga aal illada….

ooooooh .ooooo hooo ooooh
ooooooh .ooooo hooo ooooh
ooooooh .ooooo hooo ooooh

iskkalabi iskkalabi aavo aavo aavo
iskkalabi iskkalabi aavo aavo aavo

Minsaram pola santhosam thedum
velvettu poomettu naanthaanada
samsaaratholla ingutu illa
unnoda vegatha nee kaatu da . ho ...

hey raathiri aana rangoli da
ellaarum inga pangaali da
vaaliba kaatil deewali da
veenaa nee podathey ne poiveli da

Ullasam thaedi urachagam thaedi
mukthikum bakthikum nee koorada
pollaatha ulagam sonnaale kalagam
ponnukkum bothaikum poi sollalaam

Ellarum inge bakthan illa
unmaiyil yaarum buddhan illa
aasayil asaivam thappey illa
thappilaa vaazhkaiyil uppey illa

iskkalabi iskkalabi aavo aavo aavo
iskkalabi iskkalabi aavo aavo aavo

Eisalaamey eisalaam
vettaiyaada vaa salaam
veru ulagam thaedalam
vaa ..vaa.. vaa ..

Hey ..thaanam thandha boomi da
thaangi pidikkum saami da
vaazhndhu theerthaan gnyaani da
soragatha verengum thedatha da
